confirm-platform.heading: Did you select the correct platform?
confirm-platform.explanation:
We will analyse the app’s tracking behaviour for you. But first, we need to check one more thing: Apps may behave differently depending on which platform they are running on.

Which operating system does your device run?

wrong-platform.heading: Sorry, we cannot analyse this app on {{actualPlatform}}.
wrong-platform.explanation: You have been looking at the {{platform}} version of the app. Please search for the {{actualPlatform}} version instead.
